name: Wiz
description: This plugin is used to fetch Applications and Workloads from the Wiz platform. This plugin does not support performing any actions on the Applications and Workloads.

configuration.label: API Endpoint URL
configuration.description: API Endpoint URL for Wiz platform based on Tenant type. e.g. https://api.<TENANT_DATA_CENTER>.<ENVIRONMENT>

configuration.label: Token URL
configuration.description: Token URL for Wiz platform based on Tenant type to generate the auth token. e.g. https://auth.app.wiz.io

configuration.label: Wiz Tables
configuration.description: Select the Wiz tables to fetch data from.

configuration.label: Initial Range (in days)
configuration.description: Number of days to pull the Workloads data for the initial run. Value must be from 0 to 2^62.
